label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_003
content:
## 2024-03-18 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 66
- Active: 66
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 8
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 0

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 23
- Standard: 21
- Placebo: 22

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.1
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.8
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents mg Mean: 44.3
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents mg SD: 8.2
- Multimodal Six MWT Meters Mean: 283.0
- Multimodal Six MWT Meters SD: 50.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength kg Mean: 23.6
- Multimodal Grip Strength kg SD: 4.8
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.6
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.8
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.7
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.9

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.1
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.7
- Standard Morphine Equivalents mg Mean: 50.1
- Standard Morphine Equivalents mg SD: 12.0
- Standard Six MWT Meters Mean: 278.0
- Standard Six MWT Meters SD: 31.0
- Standard Grip Strength kg Mean: 20.9
- Standard Grip Strength kg SD: 3.8
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.1
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.1
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 5.3
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.8

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.9
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.4
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents mg Mean: 49.3
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents mg SD: 8.1
- Placebo Six MWT Meters Mean: 254.0
- Placebo Six MWT Meters SD: 45.0
- Placebo Grip Strength kg Mean: 18.3
- Placebo Grip Strength kg SD: 5.4
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.9
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.9
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.8
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.1

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 131
- Sessions Attended: 125
- Attendance Rate %: 83.9

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin g/dL Mean: 13.4
- Hemoglobin g/dL SD: 1.1
- WBC k Mean: 6.3
- WBC k SD: 1.5
- Platelets k Mean: 232
- Platelets k SD: 49
- Serum Creatinine mg/dL Mean: 0.94
- Serum Creatinine mg/dL SD: 0.11
- Blood Glucose mg/dL Mean: 95.0
- Blood Glucose mg/dL SD: 20.0
- ESR mm/hr Mean: 12.0
- ESR mm/hr SD: 4.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-0336, Description: urinary retention, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-0345, Description: diaphoresis, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-0332, Description: dry mouth, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-0384, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-0363, Description: muscle spasm, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- No protocol deviations reported.

### Events
- Pain diary electronic collection rate: 82%
- Physical therapy schedule coordinated across 8 sites
- Opioid conversion table reference updated per FDA guidance

### Notes
- Week 3: Pain management assessments on track. 66 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
